احسب زكاتك مع مؤسسة اترك أثرا: Calculate your zakat with Etruk Athra Foundation
كيف تحسب زكاتك؟ حاسبة الزكاة على موقع مؤ: How do you calculate your zakat? The Zakat Calculator on the Etruk Athra Foundation website enables you to calculate the value of your Zakat after writing the money or the amount you own after achieving the Zakat Nisab. Etruk Athra Foundation disburses your zakat money in the legal zakat banks. * Please contact a legal fatwa agency or house in order to verify the conditions and controls of the due zakat.

تطوع دائم: Permanent Volunteer: The volunteer must be employed on an ongoing basis.
تطوع مؤقت: Temporary volunteering: It is volunteering either for a specific period of time or for intermittent periods of time according to the need for a specific and specific activity only or for a set of specific activities.
– أداء واجبات عمله ومهامه الموكلة إليه ب: - Actively performs his duties and tasks entrusted to him with honesty, integrity, accuracy, professionalism and impartiality to the fullest of his abilities.
– الحرص على الإلمام بالقوانين والأنظمة ا: Ensuring familiarity with the laws and regulations in force and their application without any infringement, violation or negligence.
– تكريس أوقات الدوام الرسمي للقيام بمهام: - Dedicating official working hours to carrying out his work duties, and not doing any activity that is not related to his professional duties
– السعي الدائم لتحسين أدائه وتطوير قدرات: - Constantly striving to improve his performance, develop his professional capabilities, and keep abreast of the latest developments in his overall work.
– تقديم المقترحات التي من شأنها تحسين أس: - Submitting proposals that would improve work methods, raise the level of professional performance, and help provide a safe and healthy work environment.
– الامتناع عن أي تصرفات أو ممارسات أو أع: - Refrain from any actions, practices or actions that violate morals and ethical behavior, and refrain from offending the religious beliefs of others inside or outside his circle or inciting against them.
– أن يكون المتطوع حسن السيرة و السلوك و: - The volunteer must be of good conduct and behavior, and that no judgment has been passed against him and that he is not required to appear before any court.
– أن يلتزم المتطوع برسالة وأهداف المجموع: - The volunteer must abide by the group's mission and goals set out in the bylaw and strive to implement them with kindness
– الإيمان بالعمل التطوعي وتقديم القيمة ا: - Belief in voluntary work and providing the added value to the group through it.
– الاستعداد لتنمية مهاراته و تطويرها بما: - Willingness to develop and develop his skills to serve the work.
- Commitment to perform the assigned tasks.
- Commitment to a code of professional conduct.
